original_text: But the high places were not taken out of Israel. Nevertheless, the heart of Asa was wholly true all his days.
korean_text: 산당은 이스라엘 중에서 제하지 아니하였으나 아사의 마음이 일평생 온전하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the high places were not taken out of Israel.
Nevertheless, the heart of Asa was wholly true all his days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 아사의 마음은 그의 평생 동안 온전히 진실했다.
